TopicTitle: NSEA PROTECTOR - Starship from Galaxy Quest - Never Give Up! Never Surrender!

Articles.Content:
I hope this ship needs no introduction; this is the NSEA Protector from the cult sci-fi comedy film Galaxy Quest.

You might need to right-click that link and use 'Save As' or similar.

NOTES

YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to cheat this into orbit with HyperEdit or similar. She should hold together on the surface so Ã¢â‚¬ËœHack GravityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ should not be needed. Main engines are limited at 50% thrust as anything more upsets the delicate COM/COT balance.

SPECIFICATIONS

Delta-V: 4,304m/s

Mass: 202t (including Command Deck)

Dry Mass: 50t (including Command Deck)

Part count (including Command Deck): 175

CONTROLS

[4] Toggle antennas

[6] Toggle internal lights

[7] Undock/decouple Command Deck/Bridge

[8] Toggle aft docking port doors (at rear)

[9] Toggle docking bay doors

[0] Undock/decouple docking bay port

Please enjoy the ship and leave me some love (rep) if you like it!

Nice! Does it have the corridor with the stupidly-placed crusher blocks?
Damn I forgot to add those! I do have a Gorignak rock monster stashed on board though
Aw, sweet! I just watched the film yesterday (and I remembered I MET TIM ALLEN WHEN I WAS 5), so this is a blessing to KSP + Galaxy Quest fans!
I tried to rep you only to realize I already had =D
Damn I remember watching that film maybe 5 years ago... I should watch it again, shouldn't I? All I remember is something called an omegasomethingorwhatever.
